segment.source: This article covers the four notification options&\#8212;local, scheduled, periodic, and push&\#8212;that deliver tile and badge updates and toast notification content.
segment.target: This article covers the four notification options&\#8212;local, scheduled, periodic, and push&\#8212;that deliver tile and badge updates and toast notification content.

segment.source: Choose a notification delivery method
segment.target: Choose a notification delivery method

segment.source: Choose a notification delivery method
segment.target: Choose a notification delivery method

segment.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive \]

segment.source: This article covers the four notification options—local, scheduled, periodic, and push—that deliver tile and badge updates and toast notification content.
segment.target: This article covers the four notification options—local, scheduled, periodic, and push—that deliver tile and badge updates and toast notification content.

segment.source: A tile or a toast notification can get information to your user even when the user is not directly engaged with your app.
segment.target: A tile or a toast notification can get information to your user even when the user is not directly engaged with your app.

segment.source: The nature and content of your app and the information that you want to deliver can help you determine which notification method or methods is best for your scenario.
segment.target: The nature and content of your app and the information that you want to deliver can help you determine which notification method or methods is best for your scenario.

segment.source: Notification delivery methods overview
segment.target: Notification delivery methods overview

segment.source: There are four mechanisms that an app can use to deliver a notification:
segment.target: There are four mechanisms that an app can use to deliver a notification:

segment.source: Local
segment.target: Local

segment.source: Scheduled
segment.target: Scheduled

segment.source: Periodic
segment.target: Periodic

segment.source: Push
segment.target: Push

segment.source: This table summarizes the notification delivery types.
segment.target: This table summarizes the notification delivery types.

segment.source: Delivery method
segment.target: Delivery method

segment.source: Use with
segment.target: Use with

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Examples
segment.target: Examples

segment.source: Local
segment.target: Local

segment.source: Tile, Badge, Toast
segment.target: Tile, Badge, Toast

segment.source: A set of API calls that send notifications while your app is running, directly updating the tile or badge, or sending a toast notification.
segment.target: A set of API calls that send notifications while your app is running, directly updating the tile or badge, or sending a toast notification.

segment.source: A music app updates its tile to show what's Now Playing.
segment.target: A music app updates its tile to show what's Now Playing.

segment.source: A game app updates its tile with the user's high score when the user leaves the game.
segment.target: A game app updates its tile with the user's high score when the user leaves the game.

segment.source: A badge whose glyph indicates that there's new info int the app is cleared when the app is activated.
segment.target: A badge whose glyph indicates that there's new info int the app is cleared when the app is activated.

segment.source: Scheduled
segment.target: Scheduled

segment.source: Tile, Toast
segment.target: Tile, Toast

segment.source: A set of API calls that schedule a notification in advance, to update at the time you specify.
segment.target: A set of API calls that schedule a notification in advance, to update at the time you specify.

segment.source: A calendar app sets a toast notification reminder for an upcoming meeting.
segment.target: A calendar app sets a toast notification reminder for an upcoming meeting.

segment.source: Periodic
segment.target: Periodic

segment.source: Tile, Badge
segment.target: Tile, Badge

segment.source: Notifications that update tiles and badges regularly at a fixed time interval by polling a cloud service for new content.
segment.target: Notifications that update tiles and badges regularly at a fixed time interval by polling a cloud service for new content.

segment.source: A weather app updates its tile, which shows the forecast, at 30-minute intervals.
segment.target: A weather app updates its tile, which shows the forecast, at 30-minute intervals.

segment.source: A daily deals site updates its deal-of-the-day every morning.
segment.target: A daily deals site updates its deal-of-the-day every morning.

segment.source: A tile that displays the days until an event updates the displayed countdown each day at midnight.
segment.target: A tile that displays the days until an event updates the displayed countdown each day at midnight.

segment.source: Push
segment.target: Push

segment.source: Tile, Badge, Toast, Raw
segment.target: Tile, Badge, Toast, Raw

segment.source: Notifications sent from a cloud server, even if your app isn't running.
segment.target: Notifications sent from a cloud server, even if your app isn't running.

segment.source: A shopping app sends a toast notification to let a user know about a sale on an item that they're watching.
segment.target: A shopping app sends a toast notification to let a user know about a sale on an item that they're watching.

segment.source: A news app updates its tile with breaking news as it happens.
segment.target: A news app updates its tile with breaking news as it happens.

segment.source: A sports app keeps its tile up-to-date during an ongoing game.
segment.target: A sports app keeps its tile up-to-date during an ongoing game.

segment.source: A communication app provides alerts about incoming messages or phone calls.
segment.target: A communication app provides alerts about incoming messages or phone calls.

segment.source: Local notifications
segment.target: Local notifications

segment.source: Updating the app tile or badge or raising a toast notification while the app is running is the simplest of the notification delivery mechanisms; it only requires local API calls.
segment.target: Updating the app tile or badge or raising a toast notification while the app is running is the simplest of the notification delivery mechanisms; it only requires local API calls.

segment.source: Every app can have useful or interesting information to show on the tile, even if that content only changes after the user launches and interacts with the app.
segment.target: Every app can have useful or interesting information to show on the tile, even if that content only changes after the user launches and interacts with the app.

segment.source: Local notifications are also a good way to keep the app tile current, even if you also use one of the other notification mechanisms.
segment.target: Local notifications are also a good way to keep the app tile current, even if you also use one of the other notification mechanisms.

segment.source: For instance, a photo app tile could show photos from a recently added album.
segment.target: For instance, a photo app tile could show photos from a recently added album.

segment.source: We recommended that your app update its tile locally on first launch, or at least immediately after the user makes a change that your app would normally reflect on the tile.
segment.target: We recommended that your app update its tile locally on first launch, or at least immediately after the user makes a change that your app would normally reflect on the tile.

segment.source: That update isn't seen until the user leaves the app, but by making that change while the app is being used ensures that the tile is already up-to-date when the user departs.
segment.target: That update isn't seen until the user leaves the app, but by making that change while the app is being used ensures that the tile is already up-to-date when the user departs.

segment.source: While the API calls are local, the notifications can reference web images.
segment.target: While the API calls are local, the notifications can reference web images.

segment.source: If the web image is not available for download, is corrupted, or doesn't meet the image specifications, tiles and toast respond differently:
segment.target: If the web image is not available for download, is corrupted, or doesn't meet the image specifications, tiles and toast respond differently:

segment.source: Tiles: The update is not shown
segment.target: Tiles: The update is not shown

segment.source: Toast: The notification is displayed, but with a placeholder image
segment.target: Toast: The notification is displayed, but with a placeholder image

segment.source: Although local notifications don't expire, it's a best practice to set an explicit expiration time.
segment.target: Although local notifications don't expire, it's a best practice to set an explicit expiration time.

segment.source: For more information, see these topics:
segment.target: For more information, see these topics:

segment.source: Send a local tile notification
segment.target: Send a local tile notification

segment.source: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) notifications code samples
segment.target: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) notifications code samples

segment.source: Scheduled notifications
segment.target: Scheduled notifications

segment.source: Scheduled notifications are the subset of local notifications that can specify the precise time when a tile should be updated or a toast notification should be shown.
segment.target: Scheduled notifications are the subset of local notifications that can specify the precise time when a tile should be updated or a toast notification should be shown.

segment.source: Scheduled notifications are ideal in situations where the content to be updated is known in advance, such as a meeting invitation.
segment.target: Scheduled notifications are ideal in situations where the content to be updated is known in advance, such as a meeting invitation.

segment.source: If you don't have advance knowledge of the notification content, you should use a push or periodic notification.
segment.target: If you don't have advance knowledge of the notification content, you should use a push or periodic notification.

segment.source: By default, scheduled notifications expire three days from the time that they are delivered.
segment.target: By default, scheduled notifications expire three days from the time that they are delivered.

segment.source: If needed, you can override this default with an explicit expiration time.
segment.target: If needed, you can override this default with an explicit expiration time.

segment.source: For more information, see these topics:
segment.target: For more information, see these topics:

segment.source: Guidelines for scheduled notifications
segment.target: Guidelines for scheduled notifications

segment.source: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) notifications code samples
segment.target: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) notifications code samples

segment.source: Periodic notifications
segment.target: Periodic notifications

segment.source: Periodic notifications give you live tile updates with a minimal cloud service and client investment.
segment.target: Periodic notifications give you live tile updates with a minimal cloud service and client investment.

segment.source: They are also an excellent method of distributing the same content to a wide audience.
segment.target: They are also an excellent method of distributing the same content to a wide audience.

segment.source: Your client code specifies the URL of a cloud location that Windows polls for tile or badge updates, and how often the location should be polled.
segment.target: Your client code specifies the URL of a cloud location that Windows polls for tile or badge updates, and how often the location should be polled.

segment.source: At each polling interval, Windows contacts the URL to download the specified XML content and display it on the tile.
segment.target: At each polling interval, Windows contacts the URL to download the specified XML content and display it on the tile.

segment.source: Periodic notifications require the app to host a cloud service, and this service will be polled at the specified interval by all users who have the app installed.
segment.target: Periodic notifications require the app to host a cloud service, and this service will be polled at the specified interval by all users who have the app installed.

segment.source: Note that periodic updates cannot be used for toast notifications; toast notifications are best served by scheduled or push notifications.
segment.target: Note that periodic updates cannot be used for toast notifications; toast notifications are best served by scheduled or push notifications.

segment.source: By default, periodic notifications expire three days from the time that the polling occurs.
segment.target: By default, periodic notifications expire three days from the time that the polling occurs.

segment.source: If needed, you can override this default with an explicit expiration time.
segment.target: If needed, you can override this default with an explicit expiration time.

segment.source: For more information, see these topics:
segment.target: For more information, see these topics:

segment.source: Periodic notification overview
segment.target: Periodic notification overview

segment.source: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) notifications code samples
segment.target: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) notifications code samples

segment.source: Push notifications
segment.target: Push notifications

segment.source: Push notifications are ideal to communicate real-time data or data that is personalized for your user.
segment.target: Push notifications are ideal to communicate real-time data or data that is personalized for your user.

segment.source: Push notifications are used for content that is generated at unpredictable times, such as breaking news, social network updates, or instant messages.
segment.target: Push notifications are used for content that is generated at unpredictable times, such as breaking news, social network updates, or instant messages.

segment.source: Push notifications are also useful in situations where the data is time-sensitive in a way that would not suit periodic notifications, such as sports scores during a game.
segment.target: Push notifications are also useful in situations where the data is time-sensitive in a way that would not suit periodic notifications, such as sports scores during a game.

segment.source: Push notifications require a cloud service that manages push notification channels and chooses when and to whom to send notifications.
segment.target: Push notifications require a cloud service that manages push notification channels and chooses when and to whom to send notifications.

segment.source: By default, push notifications expire three days from the time that they are received by Windows Push Notification Services (WNS).
segment.target: By default, push notifications expire three days from the time that they are received by Windows Push Notification Services (WNS).

segment.source: If needed, you can override this default with an explicit expiration time.
segment.target: If needed, you can override this default with an explicit expiration time.

segment.source: For more information, see:
segment.target: For more information, see:

segment.source: Windows Push Notification Services (WNS) overview
segment.target: Windows Push Notification Services (WNS) overview

segment.source: Guidelines for push notifications
segment.target: Guidelines for push notifications

segment.target: Universal Windows Platform (UWP) notifications code samples

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: This article is for Windows 10 developers writing Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
segment.target: This article is for Windows 10 developers writing Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

segment.source: If you're developing for Windows 8.x or Windows Phone 8.x, see the archived documentation.
segment.target: If you're developing for Windows 8.x or Windows Phone 8.x, see the archived documentation.
